EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, THURSDAY FEBRUARY 9, 2017 
PART I 
Acts, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations 
NATIONAL ASSEMBLY SECRETARIAT 
Islamabad, the 8th February, 2017 
No. F. 22(12)/2016-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent ofthe President on the 3rd February, 2017 is hereby 
Published for general information:— 
ACT NO. I OF 2017 
An Act further to amend the Central Law Officers Ordinance, 1970 
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Central Law Officers 
Ordinance, 1970 (VII of 1970), for the purposes hereinafter appearing; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:- 
1. 	Short title and commencement—(l) This Act may be called the 
Central Law Officers (Amendment) Act, 2017. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once. 
(11) 
Price : Rs. 2.00 
[146 (2017)/Ex. Gaz.] 
12 	THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., FEBRUARY 9, 2017 	[PART I 	
2. 	Amendment of section 2, Ordinance VII of 1970.—In the Central 
Law Officers Ordinance, 1970 (VII of 1970), hereinafter referred to as the said 
Ordinance, in section 2, in sub-section (1), for the words "Standing Counsel" the 
words "Assistarit Attorneys-General" shall be substituted. 	
3. 	Amendment of section 3, Ordinance VII of 1970.—In the said 
Ordinance, in section 3, in paragraph (b), for the words and comma "Standing 
Counsel, he is qualified for appointment as a judge of a High Court" the words and 
comma "Assistant Attorney-General, he has for a period of not less than seven 
years been In Advocate of a High Cow? shall be substituted. 	
4. 	Amendment of section 3A, Ordinance VII of 1970.—In the said • 
Ordinance, in section 3A,— 
in sub-section (I), for the words "a Standing Counsel" the words "an 
Assistant Attorney-General" shall be substituted; and 
in. sub-section (2), for the words "Standing Counsel" the words 
"Assistant Attorney-General" shall be substituted. 	
5. 	Amendment of section 4, Ordinance VII of 1970.—In the said 
Ordinance, in section 4,— 
for the words "Standing Counsel" the words "Assistant Attorney-
General" shall be substituted; and 
for the full stop at the end, a colon shall be substituted and thereafter 
the following proviso shall be added, namely:— 
"Provided that an Assistant Attorney-General shall have right of audience 
before the Supreme Court subject to a licence issued by the Pakistan Bar Council." 	
6. 	Amendment of section 4A, Ordinance VII of 1970.—In the said 
Ordinance, in section 4A, for the words "Standing Counsel" the words "Assistant 
Attorneys-General" shall be substituted. 
ABDUL JABBAR ALI, 
Secretary. 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER. PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI.
